LanguageData.GR_ParaMilk.label: paraceramuffalo milk
LanguageData.GR_ParaMilk.description: Paraceramuffalo milk is rich and creamy. Probably too rich in fat, but certainly tasty.
LanguageData.GR_GreenMilk.label: green milk
LanguageData.GR_GreenMilk.description: This Lizardochs milk is green coloured, and quite unappetizing.
